name: ngx-take-until-destroy
description: Class decorator that adds takeUntil component destroyed

scripts.clear: npm run clearDist && npm run clearTest
scripts.compile: tsc --p tsconfig.es5.json && tsc --p tsconfig.es2015.json && tsc --p tsconfig.umd.json
scripts.test: npm run clear && npm run compile && npm run compileTest && tape ./dist-test/test/index.js
